title: 10.9 Million Names Now Aboard NASA's Perseverance Mars Rover
preview_text: As part of NASA's 'Send Your Name to Mars' campaign, they've been stenciled onto three microchips along with essays from NASA's 'Name the Rover' contest. Next stop: Mars.
